name: Tu Delicia Restaurant and Seafood

Awesome customer service.
They make you feel like family and serve you with a smile.
Great food.
Had the boneless chicharones with white rice, tostones and avocado with onions.
Clean environment and clean bathroom.
Spacious and good bright lighting.
Will come back!
This is a place you find and wonder how you lived without it. AMAZING food. Great service.
Comida bien fresca y siempre deliciosa complementado por un excelente servicio al cliente. Tengo dos meses comiendo aqu√≠ y nunca fayan üòÅ‚Ä¶

Looks like a newer restaurant in this neighborhood. I ordered takeout from here. The woman on the phone was pretty friendly and the meal was ready pretty quickly. The food was pretty good. We ordered the #2 combo and some pork chops. The sizes are pretty big and that fed four people with leftovers.

However the pork chops came with a side salad that was not very fresh. It smelled pretty bad so no one ate it. At the end of the dinner tho, I did find a bug in it so that's nice... horrible sanitation and food safety back there I guess.

The combo was good tho, it came with a big container of rice and beans as well as sweet plantains. The chicken was fried but more fried like small chicken tenders with batter than chicharron de pollo.

Overall, good food and decent prices but I won't be back.
We ordered the Shrimp Pasta with white sauce. It was very good, just a bit too much cilantro.
